sentences.sentence: These elephants were of different sizes, and some had their mahouts or palanquins on their backs.
sentences.translation: 这些大象的体型各不相同，有些的背上还背着象夫或轿子。

sentences.sentence: There is plenty to see inside – including gilt palanquins and bejewelled daggers – but it is the view of the city spread out below that is sublime.
sentences.translation: 城堡本身足够令人震撼，里面有很多东西可看，包括一架镀金的轿子和镶嵌有宝石的短剑。 但还是古堡脚下铺陈开来的城市景像更为壮观。
